trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to allow, deny, or revoke access rights for a trustee.
trans-unit.target: 指定是允许、拒绝还是撤消受信者的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Messaging.AccessControlEntry> class to specify a new access right for a trustee, you set its <xref:System.Messaging.AccessControlEntry.EntryType%2A> property to describe whether to grant the right or deny it.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用<xref:System.Messaging.AccessControlEntry>类来指定新的访问权限为受信者，则将设置其<xref:System.Messaging.AccessControlEntry.EntryType%2A>属性来描述是否将权限授予或拒绝它。

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, you can define whether the new right is appended to an existing list (if the trustee already exists in the context for which you are adding or removing access privileges) or if the new right overwrites and deletes any previously defined rights.
trans-unit.target: 此外，你可以定义是否将新权限追加到现有列表 （如果添加或删除访问权限的上下文中已存在受信者），或如果新权限将覆盖并删除以前定义的任何权限。

trans-unit.source: When creating a new `Allow` entry, there might be a preexisting `Deny` entry for the same trustee that takes precedence and must be addressed.
trans-unit.target: 在创建新`Allow`条目，可能会有预先存在`Deny`同一受信者是优先，必须处理的条目。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, when creating a new `Deny` entry, there might be an existing `Allow` entry that takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 同样，在创建新`Deny`条目，可能有一个现有`Allow`优先的条目。

trans-unit.source: For information about the order in which access rights are applied, see <xref:System.Messaging.AccessControlList>.
trans-unit.target: 有关权限应用中的访问权限的顺序的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Messaging.AccessControlList>。

trans-unit.source: An access-allowed entry that causes the new rights to be added to any existing rights the trustee has.
trans-unit.target: 一个允许访问的项，它导致新权限被添加到受信者所具有的任何现有权限中。

trans-unit.source: An access-denied entry that denies the specified rights in addition to any currently denied rights of the trustee.
trans-unit.target: 一个访问被拒绝的项，它拒绝除受信者的任何当前拒绝的权限之外的指定的权限。

trans-unit.source: An entry that removes all existing allowed or denied rights for the specified trustee.
trans-unit.target: 一个项，它移除指定受信者的现有所有允许或拒绝的权限。

trans-unit.source: An access-allowed entry that is similar to <see langword="Allow" />, except that the new entry allows only the specified rights.
trans-unit.target: 一个允许访问的项，它与 <see langword="Allow" /> 类似，只是新项只允许指定的权限。

trans-unit.source: Using it discards any existing rights, including all existing access-denied entries for the trustee.
trans-unit.target: 使用该项将放弃所有现有权限，包括该受信者的现有所有访问被拒绝的项。
